meanings.definition: To carry items in a backpack.
meanings.sent1: She backpacked her books to school every day.
meanings.sent2: He backpacked his camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel backpacked nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams backpacked her to far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The hiker backpacked memories of the mountain adventure.

meanings.sent1: The backpacked contained all his essentials for the hike.
meanings.sent2: She grabbed her backpacked and headed out the door.
meanings.sent4: His backpacked was a treasure trove of snacks.
meanings.sent5: The backpacked weighed heavily on his shoulders.

meanings.sent1: They are backpacking supplies for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys backpacking through the wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The robot backpacking groceries was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts backpacking worries of the future.
meanings.sent5: The wind backpacked whispers of ancient tales.
